feature1.explanation: Both texts have similar use of punctuation marks such as commas and ellipses.

overall.explanation: Considering the similarities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, narrative styles, and absence of spelling errors, there is moderate confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
